long_description: Don't be fooled by its size. The compact Princeton Tec Byte Headlamp packs a powerful punch thanks to its Maxbright LED to light up the dark trail ahead. Single Maxbright LED outputs 50 lumens to light up your nighttime activities; Maxbright LED throws light up to 30m on high and 18m on low. Use the single standard red LED to preserve your night vision while on the trail or hanging around camp; red LED throws light up to 7m. Single-arm ratcheting head pivots up and down, providing a wide range of motion so you can aim the beam wherever you need it. Princeton Tec Byte headlamp features a large push-button switch that's easy to operate. Operates on two AAA batteries (included), which provide up to 2 hrs. of burn time on high, 96 hrs. on low; using the red LED, the batteries provide up to 146 hrs. of operation. Princeton Tec Byte Headlamp is designed to prevent the light from accidentally being turned on when it's in your backpack. IPX4 water resistance protects against splashing water.
short_description: Don't be fooled by its size. The compact Princeton Tec Byte Headlamp packs a powerful punch thanks to its Maxbright LED to light up the dark trail ahead.
